about_the_game:
Step into the magical world of "Enchanted: A Magic Shop", where you are the proud owner of the most mystical store in town. From ancient tomes to powerful grimoires, your shop is the go-to place for wizards, witches, and magical beings seeking rare and enchanted books. But running a magic shop is no ordinary job—it’s a balance of mystery, wit, and mastering the arcane arts.

Decipher Your Customers' Needs

Your customers won’t always be direct! Engage in dialogue puzzles where you’ll need to interpret subtle clues to determine which grimoire or spell they seek.

Manage and Expand Your Magical Inventory

Stock your shop with a variety of grimoires

Craft Powerful Spells

Combine different types of spells on your arcane table to create new and unique magic.

Unravel Mysteries and Secrets

There's more to these ancient grimoires than meets the eye. As you dive deeper into your collection, you'll uncover forgotten knowledge, cryptic messages, and hidden powers that could change the magical world forever.

Respond to the Shifting Trends of Magic

Keep an eye on the town’s magical newspaper to learn about trending spells, curses, and magical phenomena.

Become the Most Renowned Magic Shopkeeper

Build your reputation by mastering the art of magic retail. Make the right sales, complete quests, and manage your shop efficiently to become the most well-known magic seller in the realm.

short_description: Welcome to your magical shop where you run a magical bookstore specializing in selling mystical grimoires.  As you progress, complete quests are given to you by mystical creatures, and interact with various magical customers.
